```{r}
response_variable = "shannon"
```

```{r}
plot.patches.boxplots(patch_type_input,
                       response_variable)

plot.patches.points(patch_type_input,
                       response_variable)

plot.patches.points.ES(patch_type_input,
                       paste0(response_variable, "_d"))
```

*Analysis*

-   Filter data

```{r}

patch_type_input_model = c("Large connected to large",
                                 "Large connected to small")

filtered_data = ds_patches_effect_size %>%
                         filter(time_point >= first_time_point_model,
                                time_point <= last_time_point_model,
                                patch_type %in% patch_type_input_model)
```

-   Full model

```{r}
full_model = lm(shannon_d ~                  
                  patch_type +
                  patch_type : day,
                  data = filtered_data)

summary(full_model)
par(mfrow = c(2,3))
plot(full_model, which = 1:5)
```

-   Effects of `patch_type`

```{r}
null_model = lm(shannon_d ~                  
                  patch_type : day,
                  data = filtered_data)

summary(null_model)
par(mfrow = c(2,3))
plot(null_model, which = 1:5)
stats = compute.model.stats(full_model,
                    null_model,
                    "linear_model")

stats
```

-   Effects of `patch_type : day`

```{r}
null_model = lm(shannon_d ~                  
                  patch_type,
                  data = filtered_data)

summary(null_model)
par(mfrow = c(2,3))
plot(null_model, which = 1:5)
stats = compute.model.stats(full_model,
                    null_model,
                    "linear_model")

results_large_patches_shannon_patch_type_day = paste0(
  "Effect of the interaction between size of the connected patch and day on shannon effect size in small patches: ",
  "P value = ", 
  stats$p_value, 
  ", Î”AIC = ", 
  stats$deltaAIC, 
  ", R2 = ", 
  stats$R2)

results_large_patches_shannon_patch_type_day
```
